short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add/Modify/Remove HTTP request headers (like Referer or Cookie) via declarativeNetRequest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to modify network requests by writing declarative rules written in INI-file format.

The extension is open-source and does not send your data anywhere.
